00036 {

00045         D3D10_INPUT_ELEMENT_DESC decl[1] = {{"POSITION", 0, DXGI_FORMAT_R32G32B32_FLOAT, 0, 0, D3D10_INPUT_PER_VERTEX_DATA, 0}};
00046         CHKRESULT(D3DX10CreateMesh(device, decl, 1, "POSITION", mdata.nVertices, mdata.nFaces, NULL, &mesh));
00047 
00048         // Set vertex data
00049         CHKRESULT(mesh->SetVertexData(0, mdata.vertices));
00050 
00051         // Set index data
00052         CHKRESULT(mesh->SetIndexData(mdata.faces, mdata.nFaces * 3));
00053 
00054         // Create and set attribute table
00055         D3DX10_ATTRIBUTE_RANGE att;
00056         att.AttribId = 0;
00057         att.VertexStart = 0;

00059         att.FaceStart = 0;

00062

00065

00067         CHKRESULT(mesh->CommitToDevice());

00239 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00240 // Name: Render()
00241 // Desc: Draw object to the device
00242 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00243 void Object10::Render(const OutputWindow* wnd, RenderType rendertype)
00244 {
00245         HRESULT hr = 0;
00246         float scale, rotx, roty;
00247         rotx = roty = 0.0f;
00248         scale = 1.0f;
00249         roty = -0.5f;
00250         //rotx = 0.5f;
00251 
00252         D3DXMATRIX matRotation, matScaling;
00253         D3DXMatrixScaling(&matScaling, scale, scale, scale);
00254         D3DXMatrixRotationYawPitchRoll(&matRotation, rotx, roty * cos(rotx), roty * sin(rotx));
00255 
00256         hr = effectparams.World->SetMatrix((float*)(matScaling * matRotation));
00257         hr = effectparams.View->SetMatrix((float*)wnd->GetCamera()->GetViewMatrix());
00258         hr = effectparams.Proj->SetMatrix((float*)wnd->GetCamera()->GetProjMatrix());
00259 
00260         static float time = 0.0f;
00261         //time += dt;
00262         hr = effectparams.Time->SetFloat(time);
00263 
00264 
00265 
00266         D3D10_TECHNIQUE_DESC techdesc;
00267         hr = tech->GetDesc(&techdesc);
00268         for(UINT pass = 0; pass < techdesc.Passes; ++pass)
00269         {
00270                 hr = tech->GetPassByIndex(pass)->Apply(0);
00271                 hr = mesh->DrawSubset(0);
00272                 //device->DrawIndexed(numindices, 0, 0);
00273         }
00274 }
